javadoc:
Defines data that is available for drag/drop and clipboard transfers.
 The data is a CompProv object which is just a holder for a owner and name for a component.

methods.javadoc: Constructs a new ComponentTransferable with the given CompProv object.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new ComponentTransferable with the given CompProv object.

methods.javadoc: Return all data flavors that this class supports.
methods.name: getTransferDataFlavors
methods.comment: Return all data flavors that this class supports.

methods.javadoc: Return whether the specifed data flavor is supported.
methods.name: isDataFlavorSupported
methods.comment: Return whether the specifed data flavor is supported.

methods.javadoc: Return the transfer data with the given data flavor.
methods.name: getTransferData
methods.comment: Return the transfer data with the given data flavor.

methods.javadoc: Get the string representation for this transferable.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Get the string representation for this transferable.

methods.javadoc: Clear the tool button that is being transferred.
methods.name: clearTransferData
methods.comment: Clear the tool button that is being transferred.

name: ComponentTransferable
comment:
Defines data that is available for drag/drop and clipboard transfers.
 The data is a CompProv object which is just a holder for a owner and name for a component.
